text: Thiago Furtuoso dos Santos (born 8 June 1987) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Greek Football League club Kalamata. ==Career== ===Othellos Athienou=== On 26 July 2019, Furtuoso moved to Cyprus and signed with Cypriot Second Division club Othellos Athienou FC.Νέο μεταγραφικό απόκτημα για την γραμμή κρούσης του Οθέλλου!
